food.name: Hot Roll
food.description: The hot roll is a Japanese fusion dish that combines the warmth of a tempura roll with the kick of spicy mayo. It features a delicious filling of crispy tempura, avocado, and cucumber, rolled in seaweed and rice. Topped with spicy mayo and sesame seeds, it's a perfect blend of textures and flavors.

food.name: Ramen
food.description: Ramen is a comforting Japanese noodle soup dish with a savory broth, Chinese-style wheat noodles, and a variety of toppings. Our ramen includes a rich broth, tender noodles, slices of pork, green onions, and a boiled egg. It's a hearty and flavorful meal.

food.name: Combo
food.description: The combo is a well-curated selection of our best dishes, offering a mix of sushi rolls, sashimi, and tempura. Perfect for those who want to experience a variety of flavors in one meal, the combo is great for sharing or satisfying your cravings for different Japanese delicacies.

food.name: Oshizushi
food.description: Oshizushi, also known as pressed sushi, is a traditional Japanese dish featuring layers of vinegared rice, fresh fish, and various toppings. Our oshizushi includes carefully selected fish and vibrant vegetables, creating a visually appealing and delicious bite-sized culinary experience.

food.name: Niguiri
food.description: Niguiri is a classic sushi dish consisting of a small bed of vinegared rice topped with fresh seafood or other ingredients. Our niguiri features high-quality fish, expertly sliced and served over seasoned rice, providing a perfect balance of flavors and textures in each bite.

food.name: Hossomaki
food.description: Hossomaki rolls are traditional cylindrical sushi rolls with nori (seaweed) on the outside and rice and fillings on the inside. Our hossomaki includes a variety of fresh ingredients, tightly rolled to create a compact and delightful bite-sized sushi experience.

food.name: Arroz
food.description: Arroz, meaning rice in Spanish, is a simple yet essential dish in Japanese cuisine. Our arroz is prepared with perfectly cooked short-grain rice, seasoned with a touch of soy sauce and mirin. It serves as a versatile and satisfying accompaniment to various Japanese dishes.

food.name: Dango
food.description: Dango is a popular Japanese sweet consisting of skewered rice dumplings. Our dango features soft and chewy rice dumplings served on sticks, with a sweet soy glaze. It's a delightful and portable treat enjoyed during festivals and celebrations in Japan.

food.name: Maki
food.description: Maki rolls are cylindrical sushi rolls with nori on the outside, rice and fillings on the inside. Our maki includes a variety of creative combinations, featuring fresh ingredients and expertly rolled to create visually appealing and flavorful bite-sized pieces.

food.name: Sanduiche
food.description: Sanduiche, a Japanese-style sandwich, offers a unique twist on the classic sandwich. Our sanduiche includes layers of thinly sliced tamagoyaki (Japanese omelet), cucumber, and ham, sandwiched between soft, fluffy Japanese milk bread. It's a tasty and satisfying handheld meal.

food.name: Temaki
food.description: Temaki, or hand-rolled sushi, is a cone-shaped sushi roll with nori on the outside and rice and fillings on the inside. Our temaki features a generous portion of fresh seafood, avocado, and cucumber, expertly hand-rolled to create a delicious and visually appealing cone.

food.name: Taiyaki
food.description: Taiyaki is a fish-shaped cake filled with sweet red bean paste. Our taiyaki features a crispy yet fluffy exterior, shaped like a fish, and a generous filling of smooth and sweet red bean paste. It's a popular Japanese street food and a delightful dessert.

drinks.name: Beer
drinks.description: Indulge in the refreshing taste of our chilled beer. With a perfect blend of malt and hops, it's a classic choice for those who appreciate a crisp and satisfying beverage.

drinks.name: Chopp
drinks.description: Immerse yourself in the smooth and frothy experience of our chopp. Served at an optimal temperature, it's a delightful draft beer that captures the rich flavors of carefully selected ingredients.

drinks.name: Orange Juice
drinks.description: Start your day with a burst of citrus goodness! Our freshly squeezed orange juice offers a zesty and invigorating taste that's sure to awaken your senses.

drinks.name: Margarita
drinks.description: Transport yourself to a tropical paradise with our Margarita. This classic cocktail blends the tangy notes of lime with the smooth finish of tequila, creating a refreshing and satisfying drink.

drinks.name: Lemon Soda
drinks.description: Quench your thirst with the sparkling goodness of our Lemon Soda. The perfect balance of citrusy lemon flavor and effervescent bubbles makes it a delightful choice for any occasion.

drinks.name: Watermelon Juice
drinks.description: Refresh yourself with the sweetness of summer in every sip of our Watermelon Juice. Cool and packed with the essence of ripe watermelons, it's a hydrating treat for all occasions.

drinks.name: Strawberry Juice
drinks.description: Savor the delightful taste of sun-ripened strawberries in every sip of our Strawberry Juice. This vibrant and fruity beverage is a perfect choice for those who appreciate the natural sweetness of berries.

drinks.name: Grape Juice
drinks.description: Experience the rich and velvety flavor of grapes with our Grape Juice. Served chilled, it's a non-alcoholic option that captures the essence of fresh, plump grapes in every sip.

drinks.name: Lemon Juice
drinks.description: Zingy and refreshing, our Lemon Juice is a burst of citrusy goodness. Squeezed from ripe lemons, this drink is perfect for those who enjoy a tangy and invigorating beverage.

drinks.name: Kiwi Juice
drinks.description: Delight in the exotic and sweet flavor of kiwi with our Kiwi Juice. Packed with vitamins and refreshment, it's a vibrant choice for those seeking a unique and enjoyable drink.

drinks.name: Tomato Juice
drinks.description: For a savory twist, try our Tomato Juice. Packed with the robust flavor of ripe tomatoes, it's a savory and satisfying choice for those looking for a unique beverage experience.

drinks.name: Coca Cola
drinks.description: Enjoy the classic and effervescent taste of Coca Cola. With its iconic flavor and refreshing carbonation, it's a timeless choice for satisfying your cola cravings.

dessert.name: Ice Cream
dessert.description: Indulge in our creamy and delightful ice cream. Choose from a variety of flavors that will satisfy your sweet cravings. A perfect treat for any occasion!

dessert.name: Passion Fruit Mousse
dessert.description: Experience the tropical goodness with our Passion Fruit Mousse. A heavenly blend of passion fruit flavor in a light and airy mousse. It's a taste of paradise in every bite.

dessert.name: Pudding
dessert.description: Indulge in the creamy goodness of our Pudding. Made with the finest ingredients, our pudding is a smooth and satisfying dessert. A classic treat that never goes out of style.

dessert.name: Strawberry Mousse
dessert.description: Delight in the sweetness of our Strawberry Mousse. Made with fresh strawberries, this velvety mousse is a strawberry lover's dream. A luscious dessert to brighten your day.

dessert.name: Dorayaki
dessert.description: Transport yourself to Japan with our Dorayaki. These sweet pancake-like delights are filled with a velvety red bean paste. A beloved treat, perfect for enjoying with a cup of green tea.

dessert.name: Carrot Cake
dessert.description: Indulge in the moist and flavorful goodness of our Carrot Cake. Topped with a decadent cream cheese frosting, it's a classic dessert that will delight your taste buds.

dessert.name: Strawberry Cake
dessert.description: Savor the sweetness of our Strawberry Cake. Layers of moist cake filled with fresh strawberries and creamy frosting. A delightful dessert for strawberry enthusiasts.

dessert.name: Colorful Chocolates
dessert.description: Treat yourself to our delightful Colorful Chocolates. Each piece is a burst of color and flavor, crafted with the finest chocolates. A visually stunning and delicious treat.
